website_summaries.verdict: Set includes 4 different weights of softballs that are ideal for training.
pros: Leather cover ensures you'll receive a good lifespan out of this set of training balls
Softballs are color-coded so it's easy to spot the weight that you want to use
Using weighted balls at practice can improve throwing speed
cons: Heavier softballs could cause some injuries through overuse

customer_reviews.title: Like them, but could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using these as part of her training now for the entire 12u spring season. Good for increasing strength but if your daughter is not throwing strikes to begin with, these will really throw her release point off. Would be nice if they were hittable as well. The stripes are running for a 2-seam which is not the ideal starting pitch but would work for simple wrist strengthening or half-motion warm-up. Also very good for strengthening standard field throwing and may even be a bit better for that.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: just work at it slow with easy throws.
customer_reviews.text: Used properly you will increase your daughters strength, just work at it slow with easy throws.. "DO NOT THROW AS HARD YOU CAN WITH THESE BALLS" you will hurt yourself.. Use with care and under trainer/coach supervision...
customer_reviews.author: Keith H

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended - makes warming up easy.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. As an adult who doesn't usually have time to get a full proper warm up before a softball game, tossing with these before throwing with a regular ball is a great way to warm up the muscles without straining yourself to hurry with a lighter weight ball. Now I don't have to throw a football beforehand - those are much harder to fit into a backpack softball bag. I almost don't even need the lower weights for throwing, could almost use two weights higher.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pitchers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13-14 year old position players so they could develop more arm strength in their throws. They love warming up with these. The 9oz one rarely gets used though since it's very close in weight to an actual softball.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: slippery leather and sharp seams
customer_reviews.text: Using these for fastpitch students to build strength in the off season. The surface leather of the ball is very slippery, hoping they break in to get better. The seams are raised but very sharp Several clients have complained that the seams hurt their finger tips. Disappointed in the grip, but the series of weights is good for different levels of students.
customer_reviews.author: CGreen

customer_reviews.title: Great for arm strength
customer_reviews.text: Great training softballs for all ages. Build arm strength by playing catch 15 minutes a day. They really work, no better way to build arm strength in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A good tool
customer_reviews.text: You would not think that something so simple as a weighted ball wouldn't help - but I find I am a lot stronger and can throw the softball much harder than before. This is really important when you are 65 and are playing with those young guys - you know 50 and above!
customer_reviews.author: just john

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone looking to add some strength to their arm.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to build strength for pitching or throwing. Have been using this to get some more strength in my throws and it works! When you pick up a regular softball after it feels so light and it really puts some pop in your throw.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Arterberry

customer_reviews.title: We love these for strengthening throwing for our little girl
customer_reviews.text: We love these for strengthening throwing for our little girl. We use them 15 minutes a day and the improvement has been great!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Tool for increasing your game !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of Champro Training Softballs for my great granddaughters to use to increase their game. It has really helped them in their games.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is just starting to learn how to pitch. She has already picked up some speed after using the weighted balls.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great strength training tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool for increasing speed, and makes kids use their legs. They do scuff up quickly if they hit the ground(concrete) do not know if that's true for dirt. Glad for the different weights to vary training sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Swickla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: Use them couple times a week and have shown no wear
customer_reviews.author: Dean C.

customer_reviews.title: Our pitchers love working with these
customer_reviews.text: On time & as described! Our pitchers love working with these!
customer_reviews.author: ahuddles

customer_reviews.title: Great pitching tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product that my daughter uses for pitching. We love them, they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Walker

customer_reviews.title: Training Softballs
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter loves them. Helping her improve her speed. Great product
customer_reviews.author: James Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these balls for pitching. They are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: eroper

customer_reviews.title: They seam to be well made. Haven't had any ...
customer_reviews.text: They seam to be well made. Haven't had any problems out of them yet. I use the smaller 2 for my daughter and the larger two weights for myself.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for young pitchers learning wrist snaps and to build strength
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great to build arm strength
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old girl loves it and can tell a difference in arm strength with my whole team. Great investment
customer_reviews.author: Andy Sandoval III

customer_reviews.title: NIce
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. My daughter is 12yrs old and using these to practice her spins for pitching.
customer_reviews.author: Jamell Rasheem Warren

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. My daughter pitches for a HS in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. My daughter pitches for a HS in the Dallas area. She uses these in her pitching practices. Product is as-advertised. All four balls are different weights.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW B SHOEMAKE

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement throwing the ball
customer_reviews.text: Damn these are awesome! Strengthened my throws and improved throwing accuracy!
customer_reviews.author: David_sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Seams could be a litttle bigger but not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they say they are. Seams could be a litttle bigger but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really help my fast pitch pitcher! I can see a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the weighted balls. I normally only use the 12oz. But it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Great training softballs
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as advertised. Work great. My arm if getting a workout throwing with my 13 year old middle school softball player.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Tool!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried out these balls with my daughter and they really do make a difference. It's helping her develop her strength and speed when pitching and her overhand throwing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great and are helping my granddaughter with her strength exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Connie G

customer_reviews.title: Great set. The real leather covers are a plus ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set. The real leather covers are a plus for catchers and their pitchers who can be particular about the "feel" of synthetic covers. The only downside is the dark primary colors on three of the four in the set. They can get lost in mid air if you are throwing with trees behind you or at dusk. Otherwise great product. Very happy. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cadair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog just loves chasing these balls around the yard. Will be doing it again thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Champro Training Softballs, Set of 4 (Green/Yellow/Black/Blue, 12-Inch)
product_meta.description: Set of 4 training softballs, Full grain leather covers, Raised seams, Training program included, The Concept: Conditioning with weighted balls ahas been referred to as Overload Training. Many players agree that training with weighted balls can improve their velocity when playing with a regulation game ball. As with other types of weight training the strength of his or her arm by training with progressively heavier balls. , Each set contains 1 each: 9 oz, Warning: Weighted training balls are intended to be used with caution in a supervised muscle development program. As with any physical activity injuries may occur. Even when used properly is a certain degree of risk. Weighted balls should not be hit with a bat or thrown to another player. They should only be thrown into screens or used for stretching exercises. The manufacturer can assume no responsibility for injuries resulting from the use of weighted training balls.
feature_bullets: STRENGTHEN: Work on building arm strength and throwing velocity through weight variations.
TRAIN: Champro's weighted training softballs have stripe patterns that allows monitoring of pitch rotation to help develop pitchers
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: 12" balls with Durahide cover are made to last.
INCLUDES: The set comes with 4 progressively heavier balls made to increase strength in any player. Full grain leather covers, Raised seams, Training program included.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
